title: 820-3437  no backlight
820-3437  no backlight
message:
Looks like U7701 gets correct adjust control; you didn't mention enable signal, BKL_EN.

"PPHV_S0SW_LCDBKLT 8.48v ~0v"
Please take your time and describe exactly the symptom.
I can supopose PPHV_S0SW_LCDBKLT drops from 8.4V to 0V.
But that is not possible if 
"LCDBKLT_EN_DIV_L 2.84V".
which should go high to 8.4V in such case; unless Q7706 is bad.

Possibly to have problem with XW7720; detailed explanations on the forum.

I used 820-3115 scraps board and macbook air, but I did not succeed"
I cannot understand what you really mean...

title: 820-3437  no backlight
820-3437  no backlight
message:
That is BGA chip, can you be sure about good soldering of reused chips???
Be serious man, that chip is 1-2 bucks new!
You just shorted 5V_S0, because of bad solders underneath...

title: 820-3437  no backlight
message: I changed the new lp8550, in the tests it is not showing any image or background light, any suggestion of what it might be ?

title: 820-3437  no backlight
message: It doesn't give an image on the outside.

title: 820-3437  no backlight
message:
Do you have image on internal LCD for sure?
If not, no reason to bother with backlight.
I explained several times, image must appear before backlight.
You don't get external video, did you check USB activity?
